successes.title: ZENDURE: Crush Proof External Batteries for Everyday Life
successes.description: Durable, powerful backup power for your mobile needs.

Pledges.description: Become a Zendure fan so that you can stay in the loop. We appreciate your participation.
A3 External Battery (9,000 mAh): SUPER EARLY BIRD - Our best price for the earliest of early adopters. A3 will retail at $59.
A3 External Battery (9,000 mAh): EARLY BIRD - Our smallest, most pocket-friendly battery at a wallet-friendly price for early birds.
A4 External Battery (12,000 mAh): EARLY BIRD - A great deal on a great battery. Take advantage of our early bird price. A4 will retail at $79.
A4 External Battery (12,000 mAh): Our most popular battery can charge an iPhone 5 up to six times.
A5 External Battery (15,000 mAh): EARLY BIRD - High capacity, low price. A5 will retail at $99.
A5 External Battery (15,000 mAh): The three-day weekend warrior. Actually, make it a four-day weekend. Supply a whole arsenal of mobile devices with our biggest battery.
A5 Glow External Battery (17,000 mAh). Limited edition, super high capacity battery pack with a glow-in-the-dark rubber belt.
A3+A4 Combo. One A3 (9,000 mAh) and one A4 (12,000 mAh) External Battery. Buy one for a friend. Or two for you. Either way, you can't beat the value. Shipping in time for the holidays.
A3+A5 Combo. One A3 (9,000 mAh) and one A5 (15,000 mAh) External Battery. Buy one for a friend. Or two for you. Either way, you can't beat the value. Shipping in time for the holidays.
A3+A5 Glow Combo. One A3 (9,000 mAh) and one A5 Glow (17,000 mAh) External Battery.
A4+A5 Combo. One A4 (12,000 mAh) and one A5 (15,000 mAh) External Battery. Buy one for a friend. Or two for you. Either way, you can't beat the value. Shipping in time for the holidays.
A4+A5 Glow Combo. One A4 (12,000 mAh) and one A5 Glow (17,000 mAh) External Battery.
A5+A5 Glow Combo. One A5 (15,000 mAh) and one A5 Glow (17,000 mAh) External Battery. Shipping in time for the holidays.
A3+A4+A5 Family Pack. Can't decide which one to get? Get one of each for a great value! One A3 (9,000 mAh), one A4 (12,000 mAh) and one A5 (15,000 mAh). Shipping in time for the holidays.
A3+A4+A5 Glow Family Pack. One A3 (9,000 mAh), one A4 (12,000 mAh) and one A5 Glow (17,000 mAh) External Battery.

A3+A4+A5+A5 Glow Ultimate Pack. One A3 (9,000 mAh), one A4 (12,000 mAh), one A5 (15,000 mAh), and one A5 Glow (17,000 mAh) External Battery. Free shipping worldwide. Perfect gift set for the holidays.
